entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Muncho Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 10 February 2023
